xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils

Class RVHistogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils.RVHistogram

  • public class RVHistogram
extends Object
    This class provides Spatial Histogram construction methods ( We refer for details to D. Achakeev and B. Seeger A class of R-tree histograms for spatial databases GIS 2012 ). These methods are used after, generating e.g. leaf node MBRs of an R-tree. The input of the method is an iterator of SpatialHistogramBucket objects (micro clusters). To map the leaf nodes of R-tree RTree to a an SpatialHistogramBucket object the following methods are provided SpatialHistogramUtils.getRectanglesLevel1.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_MIN_CAPACITY_RATIO

        public static final double DEFAULT_MIN_CAPACITY_RATIO
        Default min capacity ratio for histogram buckets. Let N be the number of input micro-clusters (e.g. leaf nodes), then N/m defines average number of micro clusters per histogram bucket. We set the minimal bucket capacity as follows (Math.max(Math.floor( N/m * DEFAULT_MIN_CAPACITY_RATIO), 1))
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_CHUNK_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_CHUNK_SIZE
        Default partition size. This parameter is used if the number of input micro clusters is too large to be process in main memory. To this end, simple heuristic is applied: we apply dynamic programming of sufficient large partitons of an input data.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • computeHistogramOPT

        public static List<SpatialHistogramBucket> computeHistogramOPT(Iterator<SpatialHistogramBucket> levelEntries,
                                                               int b,
                                                               int B,
                                                               int inputSize,
                                                               int numberOfBuckets,
                                                               double spaceUtil,
                                                               GenericPartitioner.CostFunctionArrayProcessor<DoublePointRectangle> processor,
                                                               RVHistogram.HistType type,
                                                               int chunkSize)
        This is a basic generic method for spatial histogram generation.
        Parameters:
        levelEntries - iterator containing SpatialHistogramBucket objects
        b - minimal number of objects per histogram bucket
        B - maximal number of objects per histogram bucket
        inputSize - number of SpatialHistogramBucket buckets
        numberOfBuckets - target number of histogram buckets
        spaceUtil - DEFAULT_MIN_CAPACITY_RATIO
        processor - different cost function can be provided
        type - processing type of dynamic programmin scheme
        chunkSize - chunk size
        Returns:
        a list of SpatialHistogramBucket

      • computeRVHistogramChunkHeuristic

        public static List<SpatialHistogramBucket> computeRVHistogramChunkHeuristic(Iterator<SpatialHistogramBucket> levelEntries,
                                                                            int inputSize,
                                                                            int numberOfBuckets,
                                                                            int chunkSize)
        Default method for computing a spatial histogram. The cost function is a sum of MBR volumes. OPT-Partitioning is used. Use this method if the input size cannot be processed in memory.
        Parameters:
        levelEntries -
        inputSize -
        numberOfBuckets -
        chunkSize -
        Returns:
